response.original_title: Lettre d'amour à Léopold L. Foulem
response.overview: Over the course of a summer, filmmaker Renée Blanchar enters the private world of internationally renowned ceramicist Léopold L. Foulem, a figure linked to her childhood and artistic awakening, to write him a cinematic love letter reflecting the unique work of Léopold, an extraordinary and free artist.
response.title: Lettre d'amour à Léopold L. Foulem
